title: Get Started
ctaSubheader3: by giving you access to the
materialsBullet1: • Access materials from your courses easily.
materialsBullet2: • Add new content and share it with your friends.
materialsBullet3: • See materials from previous course instances.
materialsBullet4: • Increase your score and earn bragging rights.
discussionBullet1: • Discuss courses and study materials with ease.
discussionBullet2: • Appear anonymously or with your username.
discussionBullet3: • See discussions from previous course instances.
discussionBullet4: • Ask for help from other students and be a step ahead.
